metadata.title: CVE-2015-2180 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The DBMail driver in the Password plugin in Roundcube before 1.1.0 allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters inthe password.

criterions.comment: roundcube: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
